summary: This document details the execution of a search warrant by the FBI at Little Saint James in the U.S. Virgin Islands on August 12, 2019. It outlines the presence of an attorney and security personnel during the search, as well as the involvement of various FBI agents and their roles in the operation.

persons.name: Kroblin
persons.context: Kroblin was present during the FBI's search at Little Saint James and communicated with the FBI regarding the search.

persons.name: Assistant Special Agent in Charge
persons.context: This individual was informed by Kroblin about the search prior to its execution.

connections.description: Kroblin communicated with the Assistant Special Agent in Charge regarding the search warrant execution.

events.title: Search Warrant Execution at Little Saint James
events.description: The FBI executed a search warrant at Little Saint James, involving various FBI personnel and an attorney.

locations: Little Saint James, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The FBI executed a search warrant at Little Saint James on August 12, 2019.
Kroblin was present during the search and had prior communication with the FBI.
The search involved multiple FBI personnel and concluded at approximately 7:15 p.m.
Various evidence collection methods were employed, including 3D scanning.
The document includes references to attached logs and evidence collected during the search.
